note:
I write code that connects people and tries not to lose their state. Currently likes digging into Rust and stealthily planning a next medium successful thing in the evenings.

Schrodinger Level of Engineer at Riot Games, organizer of Monadic Party, webassembly conneseur, originally a mathematical physicist from @EdinburghUni. Created a political party once, organized hackathons and campaigned for net neutrality.

Owns a great camera and often ponders taking photos more frequently.
